# Aarogya Hastha Hospitals | Best [Multi-Speciality] Hospital in Bangalore, India

Discover the best hospitals in Bangalore, India. Find expert care, advanced facilities & trusted doctors near you. Visit Aarogya Hastha Hospitals today!

## Appointment and Contact

- [Book an Appointment](https://aarogyahastha.com/appointments): Schedule your visit to Aarogya Hastha Hospitals for expert medical care.
- [WhatsApp](javascript:void(0)): Connect with us via WhatsApp for quick inquiries and assistance.
- [Call Us](tel:8066668800): Reach out to our hospital for immediate assistance at our contact numbers.
- [080 6666 8811/22/33](tel:08066668811): Contact number for general inquiries and appointments.
- [080 6666 8877/88](tel:08066668877): Alternate contact number for patient services.

## Departments and Services

### Medical Specialties

- [Anaesthesiology & Critical Care](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/anaesthesia): Comprehensive anaesthesia services provided by experienced professionals using state-of-the-art equipment.
- [Dermatology](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/dermatology): Specialized care for skin, hair, and nail concerns at Aarogya Hastha Hospitals.
- [Ear, Nose, and Throat (ENT)](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/ent): Dedicated care for ENT health, ensuring comprehensive treatment for related conditions.
- [Emergency Medicine](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/emergency-medicine): 24/7 emergency services for urgent healthcare needs.
- [General Medicine](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/general-medicine): A focus on clinical skills and patient-centered care.
- [General Surgery](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/general-surgery): A range of surgical procedures performed by skilled surgeons using advanced techniques.
- [Lab Medicine](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/lab-medicine): Diagnostic services to aid in the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of diseases.
- [Medical Gastroenterology](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/medical-gastroenterology): Expert gastroenterology services including endoscopy and colonoscopy for digestive disorders.
- [Minimal Access Surgery](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/minimal-access-surgery): Laparoscopic surgery options for a less invasive approach to treatment.
- [Nephrology](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/nephrology): Comprehensive care for kidney diseases and disorders.
- [Neurosurgery](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/neurosurgery): Advanced diagnostics and treatment for neurological disorders.
- [Obstetrics & Gynaecology](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/obg): Complete care for women's health, including prenatal and postnatal services.
- [Orthopaedics](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/orthopaedics): Specialized care for bone, joint, and musculoskeletal disorders.
- [Paediatrics](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/paediatrics): Comprehensive care for children from birth through adolescence.
- [Pain Medicine](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/pain-medicine): Focused on understanding and managing pain effectively.
- [Physiotherapy](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/physiotherapy): Personalized physiotherapy services to restore movement and improve physical function.
- [Plastic Surgery](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/plastic-surgery): Safe and effective plastic surgery procedures provided by skilled professionals.
- [Radiology](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/radiology): Advanced imaging services for accurate diagnosis and treatment.
- [Surgical Gastroenterology](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/surgical-gastroenterology): Comprehensive care for digestive system disorders.
- [Urology](https://aarogyahastha.com/departments/urology): Compassionate care for all urologic needs.

## Location

- [Site No. 2, Kasavanahalli](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//Site+No.+2,+No.+2816%2F2,+SY.87,+Kasavanahalli+Main+Rd,+near+1st+Cross+Road,+opposite+HM+Symphony,+Bengaluru,+Karnataka+560035/@12.9007391,77.6745367,21769m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m8!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x3bae132a0bbeb64b:0x626c13b98813a8a3!2m2!1d77.67569!2d12.9005956?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDkxNi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D): Main Rd, near 1st Cross Road, opposite HM Symphony, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560035.
